hero_subheading: PT Cahaya Mitratama Technology is your trusted partner in delivering smart, reliable telecommunication solutions.
about_us: PT Cahaya Mitratama Technology is a dynamic, solution-oriented company that has been serving the telecommunication industry since 2004. We provide a wide range of services and solutions to support telecom carriers and technology providers. Driven by a team of professionals, we are committed to contributing to the growth and advancement of Indonesia’s telecommunication landscape through reliable, innovative, and high-quality services.
our_vision: Our vision is to become a trusted telecommunication solution provider with high-quality services and continuous innovation. Our mission is to deliver reliable services, effective supply chain support, and customer satisfaction.
